name: CreateContactPerson
description:
Create a contact person for a contact in Zoho Books.

Use this tool to add a new contact person associated with a contact in Zoho Books. It facilitates managing additional contact person details within the platform.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the organization where the contact person will be created.

parameters.name: contact_person_details
parameters.description: Details of the contact person, including contact ID, name, email, phone, and preferences. Provide the data in JSON format.

first_name.description: First name of the contact person. Max-length [100]

last_name.description: Last name of the contact person. Max-length [100]

email.description: Email address of the contact person.  Max-length [100]

department.description: department on which a person belongs. Max-length [50]

enable_portal.description: option to enable the portal access. allowed values true,false

is_whatsapp_enabled.description: Used to check if WhatsApp communication preference is enabled for the contact person.

communication_preference.description: Preferred modes of communication for the contact person.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the zoho-books API.

first_name.description: First name of the contact person. Max-length [100]

last_name.description: Last name of the contact person. Max-length [100]

email.description: Email address of the contact person.  Max-length [100]

department.description: department on which a person belongs. Max-length [50]

enable_portal.description: option to enable the portal access. allowed values true,false

is_whatsapp_enabled.description: Used to check if WhatsApp communication preference is enabled for the contact person.

communication_preference.description: Preferred modes of communication for the contact person.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
